name: Basketball 2016 - Real basketball slam dunk challenges and trainings by BULKY SPORTS
name_original: Basketball 2016 - Real basketball slam dunk challenges and trainings by BULKY SPORTS
description:
Basketball 2016 is very fast paced newest Basketball 3D simulation game. Its the only game of its kind in Appstore that brings so much fun and challenges. Realistic Basketball players, actions and arenas makes the real fun.

It brings 25 different achievements you should unlock before your friends do. Practice basketball skills at your best and meet your targets.

Basketball 2016 contains 20+ top basketball playing nations. Select your favorite team, lead them in Tournament/Knockout competitions, Compete and WIN. Share your achievements with Facebook Friends.

With integrated global leaderboard you can compete the players all around he world. Win big matches and keep your level on the top of the list.

There are four different game modes. You can play either
-Friendly match
-Tournament
-Training
-knockout mode
with your favorite basketball team.

Social:
Join our official facebook page and keep your self updated about new improvements and games.
 https://www.facebook.com/bulkysports

Feedback:
